The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 September is 326,425 (579.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 12 September, there were 18,820 new confirmed cases (33.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 September, there were 14,168 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 33% (4652 extra cases).
